title: Good Statistical Monitoring QTLs
text: Good Statistical Monitoring ‘gsm’ suite R packages provides framework statistical data monitoring. ‘gsm.qtl’ extension contains additional functions, workflows, document template generate reports QTL.

what: Funnel Plot Analysis with Normal Approximation for Binary and Rate Outcomes. — Analyze_OneSideProp
title: Funnel Plot Analysis with Normal Approximation for Binary and Rate Outcomes. — Analyze_OneSideProp
text: Creates analysis results data percentage/rate data using funnel plot method normal approximation.

title: Funnel Plot Analysis with Normal Approximation for Binary and Rate Outcomes. — Analyze_OneSideProp
Funnel Plot Analysis with Normal Approximation for Binary and Rate Outcomes. — Analyze_OneSideProp
text: dfTransformed data.frame Transformed data analysis. Data one record per site expected columns: GroupID, GroupLevel, Numerator, Denominator, Metric. details see Data Model vignette: vignette("DataModel", package = "gsm.core"). function, dfTransformed typically created using Transform_Rate(). nPropRate numeric, 0 1, represents proportion comparison, e.g. historic screen failure rate nNumDeviations numeric, e.g. '3', standard deviations away value provided nPropRate calculate threshold Metric flagged

title: Funnel Plot Analysis with Normal Approximation for Binary and Rate Outcomes. — Analyze_OneSideProp
text: data.frame one row per site columns: GroupID, GroupLevel, Numerator, Denominator, Metric, upper_funnel flag

title: Funnel Plot Analysis with Normal Approximation for Binary and Rate Outcomes. — Analyze_OneSideProp
text: function applies funnel plots using fixed proportion/rate number standard deviations according one-sided Z proportion test.

title: Funnel Plot Analysis with Normal Approximation for Binary and Rate Outcomes. — Analyze_OneSideProp
code: # Binary dftransformed <- tibble::tribble(   ~GroupID, ~GroupLevel, ~Numerator, ~Denominator, ~Metric,   "ABC",     "Study",         25,          100,    0.25 )  dfAnalyzed <- Analyze_OneSideProp(dftransformed, nPropRate = 0.01, nNumDeviations = 3)
